document.title: Social Security Programs Throughout the World: Europe, 2004
document.abstract: [Excerpt] This issue begins the second four-volume series of Social Security Programs Throughout the World. In this new format, each volume focuses on a specific region of the world: Europe, Asia and the Pacific, Africa, and the Americas. The volumes are published at 6-month intervals over a 2-year period.
